welcome_message_body: Welcome to Alor Setar, the charming city known for its beautiful architecture, rich history, and delicious local cuisine. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your visit.

restaurants.name: Caffè Diem
restaurants.description: Caffè Diem is a café located in Alor Star.
restaurants.address: 44 Jalan Penjara Lama (Pekan Cina), 05000 Alor Star, Kedah

restaurants.name: Nasi Lan Peruda
restaurants.description: Nasi Lan Peruda is a malay restaurant located in Alor Star.
restaurants.address: Peruda (Jalan Sultan Badlishah), 05200 Alor Star, Kedah

restaurants.description: 海记海鲜饭店 is a seafood restaurant located in the city.

restaurants.description: Subway is a sandwich spot located in Alor Star.
